title: Are custom skins aloud ? (Yes) or (no)
body:

replies.body:
Just a FYI I reverted Katarina's old splash and icons in game and in client and reverted a lot of splashes. I would not recommend going any farther than this though, mine gives no competitive advantage and you can customize all of this without a 3rd part program. Changing art to me seems fine and I do it at my own risk, change particles in game though can be bad for your visuals and how they implemented :P.

Changing the art is fine, changing how particles are used and treated not so much?

Custom skins fall into a *use at your own risk* category. Because a lot of these custom skins are deployed via a third-party program not created or maintained by Riot, they can potentially contain features that could provide you with a competitive advantage. Because there are an endless number of these programs, we cannot maintain a list of what is and isn't okay. Choosing to use these could be a risk to your account and it's definitely not recommended.

You can find our official post on third-party apps [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) Although I can't tell you if a specific method or program is okay to use, let me know if you have any questions.
